verses.verse: <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and to all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> that they should <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%> But Jonathan, Saul's son, delighted much in David.

<S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>"Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H8104>you.<s%> Now therefore, please take care of yourself in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> in a <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H2244>place,<s%> and hide yourself.

I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> where you <S%H1696>are,<s%> and I will talk with my <S%H1>father<s%> about <S%H4100>you;<s%> and if I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5046>anything,<s%> I will tell you."

<S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>him,<s%> "Don't let the king <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> against <S%H1732>David;<s%> because he has not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H4639>you,<s%> and because his works have been <S%H3966>very<s%> good toward <S%H2896>you;<s%>

for he <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> You <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8055>it,<s%> and rejoiced. Why then will you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> without a <S%H2600>cause?<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>swore,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> he shall <S%H518>not<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

<S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>showed<s%> him all those <S%H1697>things.<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and he was in his <S%H6440>presence,<s%> as <S%H865>before.<s%>

There was <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H3254>again.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter;<s%> and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

An <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> with his <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H5059>playing<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>pin<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> even to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with the <S%H2595>spear;<s%> but he slipped <S%H6362>away<s%> out of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and he <S%H5221>stuck<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> to <S%H8104>watch<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> and to kill him in the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> <S%H4324>Michal,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "If you <S%H4422>don't<s%> save your <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H3915>tonight,<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> you will be <S%H4191>killed.<s%>"
So <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3381>let<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> through the <S%H2474>window.<s%> He <S%H3212>went,<s%> <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped.<s%>

<S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it in the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair at its <S%H4763>head,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> it with the <S%H899>clothes.<s%>
When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is <S%H2470>sick.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Bring him <S%H5927>up<s%> to me in the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> that I may kill <S%H4191>him.<s%>"
When the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> came <S%H935>in,<s%> <S%H8655>behold,<s%> the teraphim was <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> with the <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair at its head.

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4324>Michal,<s%> "Why have you deceived me <S%H7411>thus,<s%> and let my <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H7411>go,<s%> so that he is <S%H4422>escaped?<s%>" <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7971>me,<s%> 'Let me go! Why should I kill <S%H4191>you?<s%>'"

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him all that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H8050>him.<s%> He and Samuel <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H5121>Naioth.<s%>
It was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1732>"Behold,<s%> David is at <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3862>company<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesying,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> as <S%H5324>head<s%> over <S%H7307>them,<s%> the Spirit of <S%H430>God<s%> came on the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and they also <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%>

When it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and they also <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5012>time,<s%> and they also prophesied.

Then <S%H3212>went<s%> he also to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H953>well<s%> that is in <S%H7906>Secu:<s%> and he <S%H7592>asked,<s%> <S%H559><s%> <S%H375>"Where<s%> are <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> and <S%H1732>David?<s%>" One <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5121>"Behold,<s%> they are at Naioth in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>"

He <S%H3212>went<s%> there to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%> Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came on him <S%H3212>also,<s%> and he went <S%H1980>on,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> until he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

He <S%H1571>also<s%> stripped <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and he also <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and lay <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> all that <S%H3117>day<s%> and all that <S%H3915>night.<s%> Therefore they <S%H559>say,<s%> "Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets?<s%>"
